We've cloned `jog` (@jog) into `/src`.

## What we're running

We run an empty walk over a 4096-paragraph document:

```{python}
def cmd(p):
    return "quarto pandoc -f markdown -t json -o /dev/null ../_supporting_docs/synth-benchmark-1/inputs/_size-12.qmd -L ../_supporting_docs/filters/2024-09-03-jog.lua -M n_times:%s" % p
print(cmd(1))
```

```{python}
#| echo: false
from utils import time_call
import pandas as pd

passes = [1, 2, 4, 8]
times = [time_call(cmd(x), number=1) for x in passes]

pd.DataFrame({"passes": passes, "time": times}) 
```
